problem.markdown:
1. Amplitude of forced vibration depends on initial conditions. () True (x) False
2) We get peak response when structure is forced to vibrate at its natural frequency. (x) True () False
3) Amplitude of vibration increasing when frequency ration if greater than 1. () True (x) False
4) Maximum response of the structure will be different for different earthquakes. (x) True () False
5) Undamped structure will become unstable if it is vibrating at resonating frequency. (x) True () False
problem.p: 1. Amplitude of forced vibration depends on initial conditions.
2) We get peak response when structure is forced to vibrate at its natural frequency.
3) Amplitude of vibration increasing when frequency ration if greater than 1.
4) Maximum response of the structure will be different for different earthquakes.
5) Undamped structure will become unstable if it is vibrating at resonating frequency.
